quotes.quote: Experiment is the sole source of truth. It alone can teach us something new; it alone can give us certainty.
Experiment has a stimulus which withers its fear.
Experiments are mediators between nature and idea.
Experiment is folly when experience shows the way.
Experiment is the sole interpreter of the artifices of Nature.
Experiment is the expected failure to deliberately learn something.
If your experiment needs statistics, you ought to have done a better experiment.
Every experiment, by multitudes or by individuals, that has a sensual and selfish aim, will fail.
Experiment is the only means of knowledge at our disposal. Everything else is poetry, imagination.
Experiments that crash atoms together could start a chain reaction that erodes everything on Earth.
Experiment is actually doing the art. That's the experiment and then you get to experience the experiment.
All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
Life is an experiment in which you may fail or succeed. Explore more, expect least.
There is no such thing as a failed experiment, only experiments with unexpected outcomes.
You have a right to experiment with your life. You will make mistakes. And they are right too.
The value of experimentation is not the trying. It's the trying again after the experiment fails.
Every great inspiration is but an experiment - though every experiment we know, is not a great inspiration.
Life is an experiment, experiment by sending as many ideas in the universe and see which idea takes off and put your heart into that.
What most experimenters take for granted before they begin their experiments is infinitely more interesting than any results to which their experiments lead.
Experiment is the mother of knowledge.
Unperformed experiments have no results.
The test of all knowledge is experiment.
An experiment disproving a prediction is discovery.
Experiment is fundamentally only induced observation.
An experiment not worth doing is not worth doing well.
Experiment is the sole judge of the validity of any idea.
A failed experiment can be more important than a trivial design.
No experiment is ever a complete failure. It can always be used as a bad example.
Every experiment destroys some of the knowledge of the system which was obtained by previous experiments.
Be Shameless. Experiment. This is the only way to identify your true passion.
The test of all knowledge is experiment. Experiment is the sole judge of scientific truth.
A theory can be proved by experiment; but no path leads from experiment to the birth of a theory.
If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements.
The willingness to experiment with change may be the most essential ingredient to success at anything.
You have to experiment and that's gonna help your confidence so much when you step out and try things.
An experiment is a question which science poses to Nature, and a measurement is the recording of Nature's answer.
Physiological experiment on animals is justifiable for real investigation, but not for mere damnable and detestable curiosity.
To live you have to experiment, to have the ability to experiment you have to have confidence, to have confidence you have to be loved, to be loved you have to love.
No experiment can be more interesting than that we are now trying, and which we trust will end in establishing the fact, that man may be governed by reason and truth.
The ultimate arbiter of truth is experiment, not the comfort one derives from one's a priori beliefs, nor the beauty or elegance one ascribes to one's theoretical models.
Thought experiment is in any case a necessary precondition for physical experiment. Every experimenter and inventor must have the planned arrangement in his head before translating it into fact.
Any experiment of interest in life will be carried out at your own expense.
Have lots of experiments, but make sure they're strategically focused.
Every joke is an experiment. When you sit, alone, and write a script, or just a joke, you really have no idea if it will succeed.
Experiments work when, and only when, they call into action cognitive capacities that might reliably deliver the conclusions drawn.
The problem with experiments has always been that human beings make the decisions on whether or not the animals have benefitted from the treatment.
It is important to experiment and endlessly seek after creating the best possible flavors when preparing foods. That means not being afraid to experiment with various ingredients.
